all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For all have not every gift given unto them; for there are many gifts, and to every man is given a gift by the Spirit of God.
Doctrine and Covenants 46:11
Quote of the Day
"Vanity and becoming consumed with one’s physique, appearance, or dress can be a form of rebellion."
D. Todd Christofferson | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
